repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

did.unittitle: Ralph Hansen, "Musings on the Life of Ralph Hansen" Typescript
did.physloc: Special Collections and University Archives materials are stored offsite and must be paged 48 hours in advance. For more information on paging collections, see the department's website: http://library.stanford.edu/spc.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94305-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/spc/using-collections/permission-publish. Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [identification of item], Ralph W. Hansen, "Musings on the Life of Ralph Hansen" Typescript (SCM0440). Department of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Typescript reminiscences of Hansen's life and family genealogy, 1991; reviewed and revised 2013-2014.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Ralph W. Hansen (b. 1927) served as University Archivist at Stanford University from 1967-1979.
